title: When the Pressure is Too Much!
itunes:author: Guests: Bill & Vicki Rose
itunes:summary:
When you get married, it's easy to believe that marriage will solve your problems. However, such an unrealistic expectation can do great harm to your relationship. John, Greg, and Erin discuss what it means to have healthier expectations for marriage. Featuring Bill and Vicki Rose.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Vicki Rose's book "Every Reason to Believe" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-17?refcd=1127103

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-the-pressure-is-too-much/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
